attributes.action: give women the right to have cancer vaccine and  smear tests from the age of 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: women should have the right to have the cancer vaccine and smear test from the age of eighteen Cervical cancer vaccine and smear tests may save thousands of womens  lives each  year

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
